name: Superpoizza
description:
Trustung his old reliable bike alf sets out for delivery. Only upgrading it with a superposition engine to be even faster, collecting a bigger tips.

Alfs bike: Controll Alf along the X- and Y-Axis by pressing/holding W,A,S,D                         Hold Space to get an indecator for your jumping distance, release to take the jump.

But be carefull, a wrongly timed jump could easily destroy an entire house and you don't want to loose valuable customers.
